mapper.select: select snumber from site as s left join sitetype as st on s.stid = st.stid where stname = #{stname} and gid = #{gid}
select snumber,sname from site as s left join sitetype as st on s.stid = st.stid where stname = #{stname} and gid = #{gid} group by sname
mapper.update: update site set pstatus = #{pstatus} where sid = #{sid}
update site set sname = #{sname},sprice = #{sprice},sremark = #{sremark} where sid = #{sid}
mapper.select: select s.* from orders as o left join site as s on o.sid = s.sid where (o.sid = #{sid} and o.ostarttime = #{ostarttime} and o.oendtime = #{oendtime}) and (s.pstate = 2 or s.pstatus = 2) and s.snumber = #{snumber} and o.state = 1

select * from site where stid = #{stid}
and pstate = 1 and pstatus = 1

SELECT sname,COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM orders o LEFT JOIN site s ON s.sid = o.sid
and YEAR(otime)=YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(otime)=MONTH(NOW()) AND DAY(otime)=DAY(NOW())
and date(otime) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
GROUP BY sname ORDER BY COUNT DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT s.* FROM site s LEFT JOIN sitetype st ON s.stid = st.stid WHERE st.gid = #{gid}
SELECT * FROM site s LEFT JOIN sitetype st ON s.stid = st.stid WHERE st.stid = #{stid} AND stname = #{stname} ORDER BY sid DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: update site set pstatus=#{pstatus} where sid in ( select u.sid from(select sid from site s left join sitetype st on s.stid = st.stid left join gymnasiummessage g on st.gid = g.gid where g.gid = #{gid}) as u )
